product_name: TomTom Multi-Sport GPS Watch + Heart Rate Monitor
long_description: The TomTom Multi-Sport GPS watch + heart rate monitor lets you track, analyze and share your running, cycling and swimming metrics to help you stay motivated and reach your training goals.
short_description: The TomTom Multi-Sport GPS watch + heart rate monitor lets you track, analyze and share your running, cycling and swimming metrics to help you stay motivated and reach your training goals.
